S06adsp70-u:994_2: manuṣyā bhavanti paṇḍitā vyaktā medhāvinaḥ tadrūpayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgatā teṣām
S06adsp70-u:994_3: evaṃ bhavaty. āścaryam idam adbhutadharmo na cātra kaścid dharma upalabhyate. ayaṃ
S06adsp70-u:994_4: ca manuṣya imāṃ janatām evam asadbhir dharmair ramayati. tāṃ ca sattvasaṃjñān nopalabhate.
S06adsp70-u:994_5: adravye vateme sattvā dravyasaṃjñina iti. evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S06adsp70-u:994_6: na kaścid dharman dharmadhātuvinirmuktaṃ paśyati. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena
S06adsp70-u:994_7: na ca sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptiṃ.
S06adsp70-u:995_0: (VIII 5,5). sa ātmanā ca dānaṃ dadāti paraṃ ca dāne samādāpayati. dānasya ca varṇaṃ
S06adsp70-u:995_1: bhāṣate. ye 'py anye sattvā dānaṃ dadanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:995_2: ātmanā ca śīlaṃ rakṣati. paraṃ ca śīle samādāpayati. śīlasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye
S06adsp70-u:995_3: 'py anye śīlaṃ rakṣanti. teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī [f. 287a] bhavati samanujñaḥ. evam ātmanā
S06adsp70-u:995_4: ca kṣāntiṃ bhāvayaṃti. paraṃ ca kṣāntau samādāpayati. kṣānteś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate.
S06adsp70-u:995_5: ye 'py anye kṣāntiṃ bhāvayanti teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca vīryam
S06adsp70-u:995_6: ārabhate. paraṃ ca vīrye samādāpayati. vīryasya ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye 'py anye vīryam
S06adsp70-u:995_7: ārabhante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca samādhiṃ samāpadyante.
S06adsp70-u:995_8: paraṃ ca samādhau samādāpayati. samādheś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate ye 'py anye samādhiṃ samāpadyante
S06adsp70-u:995_9: teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātmanā ca prajñāni bhāvayati. paraṃ ca prajñāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:995_10: samādāpayati prajñāyāś ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye 'py anye prajñāṃ bhāvayanti. teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati:
S06adsp70-u:997_0: (VIII 5,6) ātmanā ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante paraṃ ca daśasu kuśaleṣu
S06adsp70-u:997_1: karmapatheṣu samādāpayati. daśānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ karmapatḥ ānāṃ ca varṇaṃ bhāṣate.
S06adsp70-u:998_0: sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:998_1: ātmanā ca aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ poṣadham upavasanti. paraṃ ca aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgate poṣadhe samādāpayati:
S06adsp70-u:999_0: aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatasya ca poṣadhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye ca anye sattvā aṣṭāṅgasamamanvāgataṃ
S06adsp70-u:999_1: poṣadham upavasanti. teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ. ātamanā ca pañcaśikṣāpadāni
S06adsp70-u:999_2: samādāya vartante. paraṃ ca pañcasu śikṣāpadeṣu samādāpayanti. pañcānāṃ ca śikṣāpadānāṃ
S06adsp70-u:999_3: varṇaṃ bhāṣate. ye ca anye sattvā pañcaśikṣāpadāni samādāya vartante teṣāṃca varṇavādī
S06adsp70-u:999_4: bhavati samanujñaḥ. evam ātmanā ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate yāva caturthaṃ maitrīṃ
S06adsp70-u:999_5: karuṇāṃ muditāṃ upekṣām ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñanāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ.
S06adsp70-u:999_6: ātmanā ca smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayati. yāvad āryāṣṭāṃgaṃ mārgaṃ trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni
S06adsp70-u:999_7: aṣṭau vimokṣān navānupūrvasamāpattīr daśatathāgatabalāni. catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ
S06adsp70-u:999_8: pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrīṃ mahākaruṇām aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān aśītim anuvyañjanāni
S06adsp70-u:999_9: bhāvayati. paraṃ ca aśītyām anuvyañjaneṣu samādāpayati. aśītir anuvyañjanānāṃ varṇaṃ
S06adsp70-u:999_10: bhāṣate ye 'py anye sattvā aśītim anuvyañjanāni bhāvayanti. teṣāṃ ca varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06adsp70-u:1000_0: (VIII 5,7) yadi subhūte dharmadhātur yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tathā madhye nābhaviṣyat.
S06adsp70-u:1000_1: na bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakauśalena sattvānāṃ dharmadhātuṃ sūcayati. sattvāṃś
S06adsp70-u:1000_2: ca paripācayiṣyati. yasmāt tarhi subhūte dharmadhātur yathā pūrvaṃ tathā paścāt tathā madhye,
S06adsp70-u:1001: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvānāṃ dharmadhātuṃ sūcayati. sattvānām arthāya bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati. sattvāṃś ca paripācayati.
S06adsp70-u:1007: kasya arthāya bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati?
S06adsp70-u:1008: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantam subhūtim etad avocat:
S06adsp70-u:1009: bhūtakoṭiṃ subhūte pramāṇīkṛtya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. yadi subhūte anyā bhūtakoṭir bhaved anyā sattvakoṭir (AdSPG II 72)
S06adsp70-u:1010: na bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caret. yasmāt tarhi subhūte na anyā bhūtakoṭir anyā sattvakoṭis,
S06adsp70-u:1011_0: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattva sattvānām arthe prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati. prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1011_1: subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūtakoṭyavikopanatayā sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:1015_0: tataḥ svabhāvaḥ svabhāve pratitiṣṭhet. na ca bhagavaṃ svabhāva svabhāve pratitiṣṭhati.
S06adsp70-u:1015_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati?
S06adsp70-u:1017_0: na subhūte bhūtakoṭir bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratitiṣṭhate. na svabhāva svabhāve pratitiṣṭhate.
S06adsp70-u:1017_1: api tu khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena
S06adsp70-u:1017_2: sattvakoṭir bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati. na ca anyā bhūtakoṭir anyā sattvakoṭir,
S06adsp70-u:1018: iti hi sattvakoṭiś ca bhūtakoṭiś ca advayam etad advaidhīkāraṃ.
S06adsp70-u:1019_0: āha: katamad bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām upāyakauśalaṃ yena upāyakauśalena
S06adsp70-u:1019_1: samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān bhūtakoṭyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati
S06adsp70-u:1021_0: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya
S06adsp70-u:1021_1: sattvān dāne pratiṣṭhāpayati. dāne pratiṣṭhāpya tasya dānasya pūrvāntāparāntamadhyam
S06adsp70-u:1021_2: ācaṣṭe. yathaiva tad dānaṃ pūrvāntataḥ śūnyam aparāntataḥ. śūnyaṃ madhayataḥ śūnyaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:1022: tathaiva dānaphalam api śūnyaṃ. dānapatir api śūnyaḥ. pratigrāhako 'pi śūnyaḥ. evaṃ kulaputrā:
S06adsp70-u:1023_0: sarva ete 'rthā bhūtakoṭyāṃ na saṃvidyante. mā ca anyad dānaṃ maṃsyase 'nyad dānaphalaṃ
S06adsp70-u:1023_1: mā ca anyad dānapatiṃ maṃsyase 'nyaṃ pratigrāhakaṃ. yadā tvaṃ kulaputra na anyad
S06adsp70-u:1024_0: dānapatiṃ maṃsyase 'nyaṃ pratigrāhakaṃ. tadā tavedaṃ dānam amṛtaṃ bhaviṣyaty amṛtaphalaparyavasānam.
S06adsp70-u:1024_1: anena ca dānena mā rūpaṃ parigrahīr mā vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ mā saṃskārān mā vijñānaṃ parigrahī. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp70-u:1025: yathā hy etad dānaṃ śūnyaṃ dānena. asya phalaṃ śūnyaṃ phalena. dānapatir api śūnyo dānapatinā. pratigrāhako 'pi śūnya pratigrāhakeṇa,
S06adsp70-u:1026: na śūnyatāyāṃ dānam upalabhyate. na dānaphalaṃ na dānapatir na pratigrāhakaḥ upalabhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp70-u:1027_0: tathā hy atyantatayā ete dharmā svabhāvena śūnyā. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo
S06adsp70-u:1027_1: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvān śīle pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:1027_2: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prāṇātipātaṃ prahāya prāṇātipātāt prativirama. yāvat mithyādṛṣṭiṃ prahāya:
S06adsp70-u:1028: mithyādṛṣṭiṃ prativirama. naiṣāṃ kulaputra dharmāṇāṃkaścit svabhāvaḥ saṃvidyate:
S06adsp70-u:1031_0: katama eṣa dharmaḥ prāṇīnām ayaṃ jīvitān vyaparopayiṣyasi. yena vā vyaparopayiṣyasi.
S06adsp70-u:1031_1: yāvan mithyādṛṣṭe kartavyaṃ. anena ca subhūte upāyakauśalena samanvāgato bodhisattvo
S06adsp70-u:1031_2: mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvān paripācayati. sa tasya dānasya ca śīlasya
S06adsp70-u:1031_3: ca phalam ācaṣṭe. tad api dānaphalaṃ ca śīlaphalaṃ ca svabhāvena śūnyaṃ. tataḥ sa
S06adsp70-u:1031_4: kulaputro dānasya ca śīlasya ca phalaṃ śūnyam iti viditvā tatra na abhiniviśate.
S06adsp70-u:1031_5: anabhiniviśamāna avikṣepam utpādya prajñām utpādayati. yayā prajñayā sarva anuśayaparyutthanāni
S06adsp70-u:1031_6: cchitvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāti. lokavyavahāreṇa na punaḥ paramārthena,
S06adsp70-u:1033_0: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate. yaḥ parinirvāyād vā parinirvāpito vā.
S06adsp70-u:1033_1: api tu khalu tad eva asya parinirvāṇaṃ yaduta [f. 288a] atyantaśūnyatā. punar aparaṃ
S06adsp70-u:1033_2: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ parasattvān parapudgalān kṣubhitān vyāpannacittān
S06adsp70-u:1033_3: dṛṣṭvā evam avavadaty evam anuśāsti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntyā saṃpādaya kṣāntiñ
S06adsp70-u:1035: yo vā vyāpadyate. yena vā vyāpadyase. yatra vā vyāpadyase:
S06adsp70-u:1037: hanta tāvat kulaputra vyupaparīkṣva ko 'tra vyāpadyate. kasmiṃ vyāpadye. kena vā vyāpadye:
S06adsp70-u:1038: sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā. yā ca prakṛtiśūnyatā na sā jātu na śūnyatā,
S06adsp70-u:1039_0: sā na tathāgataiḥ kṛtā na pratyekabuddhair na śrāvakair na bodhisattvair na devair
S06adsp70-u:1039_1: na nāgair na yakṣair na gandharvair na kinnarair na mahoragair na cāturmahārājakāyikair
S06adsp70-u:1039_2: devair yāvan na paranirmitavaśavartibhiḥ na brahmābhir yāvan na śubhakṛtsnair na
S06adsp70-u:1039_3: śuddhāvāsair yāvan na naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopagair devaiḥ. tad hanta tāvat kulaputra
S06adsp70-u:1039_4: vyupapaparīkṣasva ko 'tra vyāpadyate kasya vā vyāpadye. kena vā vyāpadye:
S06adsp70-u:1040_0: sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyāḥ. na hi śūnyatā kasyacid antike vyāpadyate. evaṃ khalu
S06adsp70-u:1040_1: subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ sattvān upāyakauśalena prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1040_2: niyojayaty. api hetāv api phale. prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ niyojayann anupūrveṇa anuttarasyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1040_3: samyaksaṃbodhau saṃharṣayati samādāpayati niveśayati. pratiṣṭhāpayati. tat punar
S06adsp70-u:1040_4: lokavyavahāreṇa na punaḥ paramārthena. tat kasya hetor?
S06adsp70-u:1041_0: na hi prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid asti yaḥ prāpnuyād yena vā prāpnuyād yad vā prāpnuyāt.
S06adsp70-u:1041_1: iyaṃ subhūte bhūtakoṭiḥ prakṛtiśūnyatā yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1042: na ca tatra sattvam upalabhate na sattvaprajñaptiṃ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp70-u:1043_0: sattvaviviktā hi sarvadharmāḥ. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1043_1: carann upāyakauśalena sattvāṃ hīnavīryān kusīdān dṛṣṭvā evaṃ kāyike caitasike vīrye
S06adsp70-u:1044: prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kasyacid dharmasya saṃsīdanā vidyate. yatra saṃsīded yena vā saṃsīded yo vā saṃsīdet,
S06adsp70-u:1045: sarva ete dharmāḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāyā na vyativartante. hantedāniṃ kāyikaṃ caitasikaṃ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayya kausīdyam utsṛjya kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu prayujyasva:
S06adsp70-u:1046_0: yadi vā dāne yadi vā śīle yadi vā kṣāntau yadi vā vīrye. yadi vā dhyāne yadi vā prajñāyāṃ.
S06adsp70-u:1046_1: yadi vā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiṣu yadi vā smṛtyupasthāneṣu yadi vā yāvad āryāṣṭāṅge mārge (AdSPG II 75)
S06adsp70-u:1050: sarvān etān kulaputra dharmān anāvaraṇān prekṣasva śūnyatāyā,
S06adsp70-u:1051_0: na hy anāvaraṇeṣu dharmeṣu kasyacid dharmasya saṃsīdanā saṃvidyate. evaṃ khalu subhūte
S06adsp70-u:1051_1: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1051_2: sattvāṃ samādāpayati. niveśayati. pratiṣṭhāpayati. tathā punaḥ pratiṣṭhāpayati. yatra
S06adsp70-u:1051_3: dvayan na vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp70-u:1053_0: na hy advayo dharmaḥ na kvacit saṃsīdati. punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp70-u:1053_1: prajnāpāramitāyāṃ caran prakṛtiśūnyatayā vīrye sattvān avavadaty anuśāsti. ehi tvaṃ
S06adsp70-u:1053_2: kulaputra vīryam ārabhasva yadi vā dāne yadi vā śīle yadi vā kṣāntau. yadi vā vīrye
S06adsp70-u:1053_3: yadi vā dhyāne yadi vā prajñe. yadi vā smṛtyupasthāneṣu yadi vā yāvad āryāṣṭāṅge
S06adsp70-u:1053_4: mārge. yadi vā aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu yadi vā navasv anupūrvasamāpattiṣu. yadi vā daśasu
S06adsp70-u:1053_5: tathāgatabaleṣu yadi vā caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu. yadi vā catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu yadi
S06adsp70-u:1053_6: vā mahāmaitryāṃ yadi vā mahākaruṇāyāṃ yadi vā aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu,
S06adsp70-u:1054: mā caitān dharmān dvayato manasikārṣīr mā advayata,
S06adsp70-u:1057_0: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatā dvayato manasikartavyā na advayataḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo
S06adsp70-u:1057_1: mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena bodhisattvacārikāṃ caraṃ sattvāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1057_2: paripācayati. sattvāṃ paripācya anupūrveṇa srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati. sakṛdāgāmiphale
S06adsp70-u:1057_3: anāgāmiphale arhattve pratyekabodhau yāvad anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06adsp70-u:1057_4: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajnāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena
S06adsp70-u:1057_5: vikṣiptacittān sattvān evam avavadati. evam anuśāsti,
S06adsp70-u:1059: mā vikṣepasaṃjnī mā samādhisaṃjñī bhūḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp70-u:1061_0: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate yo vikṣipyate ekāgri bhavati vā.
S06adsp70-u:1061_1: sa tvam atra samādhau sthitvā yad yad eva kuśalamūlaṃ kariṣyasi kāyena vā. vācā vā
S06adsp70-u:1061_2: manasā vā. yadi vā dānaṃ dāsyasi. yadi vā śīlaṃ rakṣasyasi. yadi vā kṣāntyā saṃpādayiṣyasi.
S06adsp70-u:1062: yadi vā samādhim utpādayiṣyasi. yadi vā prajñāṃ bhāvayiṣyasi. yadi vā smṛtyupasthāneṣu cariṣyasi. (AdSPG II 76)
S06adsp70-u:1063_0: yadi vā yāvad āryāṣṭāṅge mārge. yadi vā triṣu vimokṣamukheṣu yadi vā aṣṭāsu vimokṣeṣu
S06adsp70-u:1063_1: yadi vā navasv anupūrvasamāpattiṣu. yadi vā daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu. yadi vā caturṣu
S06adsp70-u:1064: yadi vā mahāmaitryāṃ yadi vā mahākaruṇāyāṃ mahāmuditāyāṃ mahopekṣāyāṃ yadi vā aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu:
S06adsp70-u:1065_0: yadi vā dvātṛṃśatimahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣu yadi vā aśītyām anuvyaṃjaneṣu. yadi vā śrāvakamārge
S06adsp70-u:1065_1: yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārge. yadi vā bodhisattvamārge. yadi vā buddhamārge. yadi

S06adsp70-u:1066: tasya te. ime kuśalā dharmā alpakṛcchreṇa prādurbhaviṣyanti prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ caratah:
S06adsp70-u:1067: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti,
S06adsp70-u:1068_0: prathamacittotpādam upādāyajna jātv akarmako bhavati. kiṃ kuśalagaveṣī sattvānām
S06adsp70-u:1068_1: arthaṃ kurvaṃ. buddhakṣetrād buddhakṣetraṃ satatasamitaṃ saṃkrāmati. buddhāṃ bhagavataḥ paryupāsinah:
S06adsp70-u:1069_0: yañ ca teśāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikād dharmaṃ śṛṇoti. tasya jātivyativṛttasya
S06adsp70-u:1069_1: api na jātu vipraṇaśyati. yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. dhāraṇīpratilabdhaś
S06adsp70-u:1069_2: ca satatasamitaṃ bhavati. ahīnendriyo. yadi vā kāyendriyeṇa yadi vā vāgindriyeṇa:
S06adsp70-u:1070: yadi vā manaindriyeṇa. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp70-u:1072: tena anayā sarvākārajñatayā subhāvitayā sarvamārgā. subhāvitā bhavanti:
S06adsp70-u:1073_0: yadi vā śrāvakamārgo yadi vā pratyekabuddhamārgo yadi vā bodhisattvamārgaḥ. tasya
S06adsp70-u:1073_1: abhijñā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satatasamitam upakārībhūtā bhavanty avipraṇāśayogena.

S06adsp70-u:1073_4: prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sthito upāyakauśalena sattvānām arthaṃ karoti. sa tayā prajñāpāramitayā
S06adsp70-u:1074: anuśāsti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra yad yad eva karma karoṣi. kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā tat sarvaṃ prakṛtiśūnyam (AdSPG II 77)
S06adsp70-u:1076: tasya te sarvaṃ karmāmṛtaphalaṃ bhaviṣyaty amṛtaparyavāsanaṃ. na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ kaścid dharma upalabhyate. yo vinaśyed yo vā parihīyeta. [f. 289a] tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp70-u:1077: na hi prakṛtiśūnyatā parihīyate nāpi prakṛtiśūnyatāyā kaścid dharmaḥ parihīyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp70-u:1078_0: tathā hi prakṛtiśūnyatā na bhāvo na abhāvaḥ. tat kim abhāvasvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu parihāsyate.
S06adsp70-u:1078_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upāyakauśalena
S06adsp70-u:1078_2: sattvān avavadaty anuśāsti. evam avavadann evam anuśāsan na jātv akarmako bhavati.
S06adsp70-u:1078_3: sa ātmanā ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu satatasamitaṃ vartate. paraṃ ca daśakuśaleṣu
S06adsp70-u:1078_4: karmapatheṣu samādāpayati. evaṃ paṃcasu śikṣāpadeṣv aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgate upavāse,
S06adsp70-u:1079_0: ātmanā ca. prathamadhyānaṃ samāpadyate paraṃ ca prathame dhyāne samādāpayati. evaṃ
S06adsp70-u:1079_1: yāvac caturthe dhyāne. ātmanā ca satatasamitaṃ maitrīvihārī bhavati paraṃ ca satatasamitaṃ
S06adsp70-u:1079_2: maitrībhāvanāyāṃ samādāpayati. evaṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyām upekṣāyāṃ yāvan. naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau,
S06adsp70-u:1080_0: ātmanā ca smṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayati. paraṃ ca smṛtyupasthāneṣu samādāpayati. evaṃ
S06adsp70-u:1080_1: yāvad āryāṣṭāṅge mārge. ātmanā ca daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu śikṣate. paraṃ ca daśasu
S06adsp70-u:1080_2: tathāgatabaleṣu samādāpayati. niveśayati vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ yāvad aśītyām anuvyañjaneṣu,
S06adsp70-u:1081: ātmanā ca srotaāpattiphalajñānam utpādayati. na ca tatra avatiṣṭhate. paraṃ ca srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ yāvad arhattve pratyekabodhau,
S06adsp70-u:1083_0: samyaksaṃbodher mārgam utpādayati. paraṃ ca tatra mārge 'vadaty anuśāsti niveśayati.
S06adsp70-u:1083_1: vinayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1083_2: carann upāyakauśalena na kadācit karma na karoti.
S06adsp70-u:1084: āha: yadi bhagavaṃ. prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ na ca prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ sattvam upalabhyate,
S06adsp70-u:1086: tat kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvākārajñatāyaiḥ saṃpratiṣṭhate?
S06adsp70-u:1091: na ca prakṛtiśunyatāyāṃ sattvam upalabhyate, (AdSPG II 78)
S06adsp70-u:1093_0: yadi punaḥ subhūte naprakṛtiśūnyā sarvadharmāḥ bhaveyur na bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ
S06adsp70-u:1093_1: prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ pratitiṣṭhet. na asya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya prakṛtiśūnyān
S06adsp70-u:1094_0: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ subhūte prakṛtiśūnyaṃ. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1094_1: caran pañcaskandhāḥ prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharman deśayati. aṣṭādaśadhātavo dvādaśāyatanāni
S06adsp70-u:1094_2: prakṛtiśūnyā iti dharman deśayati. catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasraḥ ārūpyasamāpattīś
S06adsp70-u:1094_3: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni yāvad āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga prakṛtiśūnya iti dharman deśayati.
S06adsp70-u:1094_4: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāny aṣṭau vimokṣā navānupūrvasamāpattayo. daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri
S06adsp70-u:1094_5: vaiśāradyāni. catasraḥ pratisaṃvido mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā
S06adsp70-u:1094_6: buddhadharmā dvātṛṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītir anuvyañjanāni prakṛtiśūnyān iti
S06adsp70-u:1094_7: dharman deśayati. srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalaṃ. arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ
S06adsp70-u:1094_8: sarvākārajñatā sarvavāsanānusandhikleśaprahāṇaṃ prakṛtiśūny [f. 289b] am iti dharman
S06adsp70-u:1094_9: deśayati. yadi punaḥ subhūte 'dhyātmaśūnyatā na prakṛtiśūnyābhaviṣyan na bodhisattvo
S06adsp70-u:1094_10: mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharman deśayiṣyan. evaṃ bahirddhāśūnyatā
S06adsp70-u:1096: na ca prakṛtiśūnyatā vinaśyati. na kūṭastho bhavati. nāpi sā punar avakrāmati. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp70-u:1097: na hi sā deśasthā na pradeśasthā,
S06adsp70-u:1098_0: na hi sā kutaścid āgacchati na kvacid gacchati. eṣā sā dharmasthititā yatra na kasyacid
S06adsp70-u:1098_1: dharmasya ācayo vā apacayo vā upalabhyate. hānir vā vṛddhir vā utpādo vā nirodho
S06adsp70-u:1098_2: vā saṃkleśo vā vayavadānaṃ vā. eṣā sā prakṛtir dharmāṇāṃ yatra sthitvā bodhisattvā
S06adsp70-u:1098_3: mahāsattvā anuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpratiṣṭhante. na ca kasyacid dharmasya (AdSPG II 79)
S06adsp70-u:1099: prasthānaṃ samanupaśyati na aprasthānaṃ. asaṃprasthitā. asthitā hi sarvadharmāḥ. eṣā sā dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthitā,
S06adsp70-u:1100: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmān prakṛtiśūnyān dṛṣṭvā na pratyudāvarttate 'nuttarasyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp70-u:1101_0: tathā hi sa na kasyacid dharmasya āvaraṇaṃ samanupaśyati. anāvaraṇān sarvadharmān
S06adsp70-u:1101_1: samanupaśyati. tat kiṃ vicikitsiṣyaty anuttarasyā samyaksaṃbodheḥ. yatra prakṛtiśūnyatāyāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1101_2: na sattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñaptiṃ na ātmā na jīvo na poṣo na pudgalo na jantur
S06adsp70-u:1101_3: na manujo na mānavo na kārako na kārāpako na vedako na vedayitā na utthāpako na janako
S06adsp70-u:1101_4: na paśyaka upalabhyate. na rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam upalabhyate.
S06adsp70-u:1101_5: evam ādhyātmikabāhyā dharmāḥ kartavyāḥ yāvad aśītir anuvyañjanāni.
S06adsp70-u:1102: (VIII 5,8) tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmito nirmitasya bhikṣor bhikṣuṇyā vā upāsakasya vā upāsikāyā vā anuprabandhaṃ kalpaniyutaṃ dharman deśayet,
S06adsp70-u:1103_0: tat kiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te nirmitā bhavyā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāptuṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam
S06adsp70-u:1103_1: anāgāmiphalaṃ vā arhattvaṃ vā pratyekabodhiṃ vā anuttarāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhim anuprāptuṃ?
S06adsp70-u:1104: āha: no hīdaṃ bhagavan. tat kasya hetos?
S06adsp70-u:1107_0: evam etat subhūte evam etat. avastukānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katama sa sattvo yam bodhisattvo
S06adsp70-u:1107_1: mahāsattvo niveśayet srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā arhattve
S06adsp70-u:1107_2: vā pratyekabodhau vā anuttarāyāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06adsp70-u:1108: anyatra viparyāsaparyavanaddhaḥ prajñā aviparyāse niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati. ya eva viparyāsa sa eva aviparyāsa. kalpaniṣyandam upādāya. avikalpaś ca aviparyāsa,
S06adsp70-u:1109: yatra viparyāso nāsti tatra na ātmā na sattvo yāvan na janako na paśyakaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:1110: tatra na rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ yāvan na bodhiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:1111: yatra na rūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ. yāvan na bodhiḥ,
S06adsp70-u:1112_0: eṣā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā. yatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran
S06adsp70-u:1112_1: viparyāsāṃ sattvān sattvasaṃjñāyāṃ mocayati. evaṃ rūpasaṃjñāyāt arūpasaṃjñāyān mocayati.
S06adsp70-u:1112_2: yāvat sarvebhyaḥ sāsravebhyo dharmebhyo mocayati. (AdSPG II 80)
S06adsp70-u:1113_0: ye 'pi te [f. 290a] anāsravā dharmās tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni. catvāri samyakprahāṇāni
S06adsp70-u:1113_1: catvārarddhipādā pañcendriyāṇi pañcabalāni saptabodhyaṃgāny āryāṣṭāṃgo mārga triṇi
S06adsp70-u:1115: yaduta asaṃskṛtam anutpādaḥ abhāvaḥ aprādurbhāvaḥ eṣā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06adsp70-u:1117: yatra na sattvo yāvan na janako na paśyakaḥ,
S06adsp70-u:1118_0: na rūpaṃ na vedanā sa saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ. evaṃ vistareṇa kartavyaṃ. yāvad
S06adsp70-u:1118_1: aśītir anuvyañjanāni. na hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mārgasya kṛte 'nuttarasyai samyaksaṃbodhaye
S06adsp70-u:1118_2: 'bhipratiṣṭhate. anyatraprakṛtiśūnyatāparijñāna arthe. sā api prakṛtiśūnyatā pūrve
S06adsp70-u:1119: paścād vā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā. madhye vā sā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06adsp70-u:1120_0: na sā jātu na prakṛtiśūnyatā. tad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyatāpāramitāsu
S06adsp70-u:1120_1: caraṃ sattvānāṃ sattvasaṃjñīnāṃ sarvasaṃjñāpramokṣaṇa arthaṃ mārgākārajñātāyāṃ carati.
S06adsp70-u:1120_2: sa mārgākārajñatāyāṃ caran sarvamārgeṣu carati. yaduta śrāvakamārge pratyekabuddhamārge
S06adsp70-u:1120_3: bodhisattvamārge. sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattva sarvamārgān paripūrya sattvāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1120_4: paripācya buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhya āyuhsaṃskārān adhiṣṭāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
S06adsp70-u:1120_5: abhisaṃbudhyate. buddhanetriṃ na vyavacchinnatti yaduta prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ. eṣā sā buddhānāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1121: ye 'pi te 'bhūvann atīte 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantas teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyaṃ buddhanetrī yaduta prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06adsp70-u:1122: ye 'pi te anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti buddhā bhagavantas teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyaṃ buddhanetrī yaduta prakṛtiśūnyatā:
S06adsp70-u:1123_0: ye 'pi te etarhi daśasu dikṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhṛyante yāpayanti
S06adsp70-u:1123_1: teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatām iyaṃ buddhanetri yaduta prakṛtiśūnyatā. na hy anyataḥ
S06adsp70-u:1123_2: prakṛtiśūnyatāyā lokaprādurbhāvo bhavaty anyatra buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāt,
S06adsp70-u:1125: yatra caraṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate sarvākārajñatayā.
S06adsp70-u:1128: āścaryam idaṃ bhagavaṃ. bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yatra hi nāma evaṃ prakṛtiśūnyeṣu sarvadharmeṣu caranti. tāṃ ca prakṛtiśūnyatāṃ na vikopayanty,
S06adsp70-u:1129: anyad rūpam anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā. evam anyā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānam anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā. evaṃ vistareṇa sarvadharmāṇāṃ kartavyaṃ. yāvad anyā bodhir anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā,
S06adsp70-u:1131: vedanaiva prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyativa vedanā. saṃjñaiva prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyataiva saṃjñā,
S06adsp70-u:1133: vijñānam eva prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyataiva vijñānaṃ. yāvad bodhir eva prakṛtiśūnyatā prakṛtiśūnyataiva bodhiḥ.
S06adsp70-u:1135_0: yadi subhūte anyad rūpaṃ bhaved anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā. anyā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ
S06adsp70-u:1135_1: bhaved anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā. yāvad anyā bodhir bhaved anyā prakṛtiśūnyatā. yadi subhūte
S06adsp70-u:1135_2: rūpaṃ na prakṛtiśūnyaṃ bhaven na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃsamyaksaṃbodhim
S06adsp70-u:1136: yadi vijñānaṃ na prakṛtiśūnyaṃ bhaven na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta,
S06adsp70-u:1137_0: yāvad yadi bodhir na prakṛti [f. 290b] śūnyatā bhaven na bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyttarāṃ
S06adsp70-u:1137_1: samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeta. yasmāt tarhi subhūte rūpaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ prakṛtiśūnyaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:1139: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prakṛtiśūnyān sarvadharmān viditvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp70-u:1140: na hy atra kaścid dharmo vinaśyati vā kūṭastho vā bhavaty avakrāmati vā,
S06adsp70-u:1141: anyatra sadevako lokaḥ samārakaḥ sabrahmakaḥ so mūḍhaḥ idaṃ rūpam ahaṃ rūpaṃ mama rūpaṃ. yāvad idaṃ vijñānam ahaṃ vijñānaṃ mama vijñānaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:1142: te rūpam abhiniviśya yāvad vijñānam abhiniviśya ahaṃkāramamakārayoś caranti. ahaṃkāramamakārayor abhiniviśya adhyātmikabāhyeṣu (AdSPG II 82)
S06adsp70-u:1144: abhiniviśya upapadya āyataneṣu upādadāte. rūpaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ,
S06adsp70-u:1147: tad bodhisattvo mahāsattva prakṛtiśūnyatāpāramitāsu caran rūpaṃ na vikopayati. śūnyaṃ vā na vāśūnyam iti. vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān,
S06adsp70-u:1148: vijñānaṃ na vikopayati. śūnyaṃ vā na vāśūnyam iti. yāvad bodhiṃ na vikopayati śūnyaṃ vā na vāśūnyam iti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06adsp70-u:1149_0: na hi rūpaśūnyatā rūpaṃ vikopayati. idaṃ rūpam iyaṃ rūpaśūnyatā yāvad iyaṃ vijñānam
S06adsp70-u:1149_1: iyaṃ vijñānaśūnyatā yāvad iyaṃ bodhir iyaṃ boddhiśūnyatā. tadyathāpi nāma subhūte
S06adsp70-u:1149_2: na ākāśam ākāśaṃ vikopayati. nādhyātmikam ākāśaṃ bāhyam ākāśaṃ vikopayati. na bāhyam
S06adsp70-u:1149_3: ākāśam ādhyātmikam ākāśaṃ vikopayati. evam eva subhūte na rūpaṃ śūnyatāṃ vikopayati.
S06adsp70-u:1149_4: na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāvijñānaṃ śūnyatāṃ vikopayati. na śūnyatā vijñānaṃ vikopayati.
